nodes.text: Imperial Speeders were used by stormtroopers stationed on Panna.

This particular military speeder was equipped with a laser cannon mounted behind the driver's seat. Behind the gunner was mounted an additional seat, which provided an unobstructed view for a third trooper, enabling him to take potshots to aid the speeder's main weapon.
The speeder had two large engines flanking it, and had enough repulsorlift power to skim liquid surfaces, similar to the Infantry Support Platform.
